ComicInfo.Summary: Backlash breaks Taboo out of a maximum security Stormwatch facility to ask for her help in taking down the Daemonite, S'yrn, who has put his lover, Diane, in a coma.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brett Booth,Jeff Mariotte,Sean Ruffner,Jeff Mariotte,Brett Booth,Sean Ruffner
